articles.output:
Wannan shafi ne da ke kawo muku muhimman abubuwan da ke faruwa a duniyar wasanni daga Lahadi 16 zuwa 21 ga watan Nuwambar 2025 Dan wasan Paris St Germain, Achraf Hakimi ne ya lashe ƙyautar gwarzon ɗan ƙwallon kafa na Afirka na 2025, mai tsaron baya da ya lashe ƙyautar karon farko bayan shekara 52. Ɗan wasan tawagar Masar Mohamed Salah shi ne na biyu mai taka leda a Liverpool da kuma Victor Osimhen na Super Eagles mai wasa a Galatasaray a mataki na uku. Mai tsaron bayan Morocco ya karɓi ƙyautar sakamakon nasarorin da ya samu a 2025 tare da Paris St Geramin ciki har da lashe Champions League da Ligue 1 da Coupe de France da kuma UEFA Super Cup. Shi ne na farko daga Morocco da ya karbi ƙyautar tun bayan Mustapha Hadji a 1998, kuma mai tsaron baya na farko tun bayan ɗan kasar Zaire, Bwanga Tshimen a 1973. Morocco ce ta lashe yawancin ƙyautukan da aka raba daga ciki har da ta mace mafi ƙwazo a 2025 ga Ghizlane Chebbak mai taka leda a Saudiya da mai tsaron ragar Al-Hilal, Yassine Bounou a matakin mafi taka rawar gani a shekarar nan. Morocco ta tsawaita yawan wasa 18 a jere ba tare da rashin nasara ba, sakamakon caskara Uganda 4-0 a wasan sada zumunta da suka yi a Tangier ranar Talata. Wasan yana daga cikin shirin da kasar ke yi na karɓar bakuncin gasar cin kofin duniya da za a fara daga Janairu zuwa Fabrairun 2026. Kenan Morocco ta haura tarihin tawagar Sifaniya da ta ci wasa 15 a jere tsakanin Yunin 2008 zuwa Oktoban 2009. Morocco za ta fara buga gasar cin kofin nahiyar Afirka da tsibirin Comoros ranar 21 ga watan Disamba. Curaçao da ke tsibirin Caribbean ya zama karamar ƙasar da za ta halarci gasar cin kofin duniya a karon farko a tarihi, bayan tashi canjaras da Jamaica, wadda Steve McClaren je jan ragama. Iceland ce ke riƙe da tarihin kafin yanzu, wadda ta kai wasan ƙarshe a 2018, kuma ƙasarsu ta fi Curaçao girma sosai, wacce ke da yawan jama’a sama da 150,000 kacal (kusan kamar Cambridge ko Huddersfield) da kuma fadin ƙasa mai murabba’in mil 171. Tsohon kocin Ingila, McClaren, ya yi murabus daga matsayin kocin Jamaica bayan wannan koma bayan, wadda tun farko ke bukatar nasara a Kingston domin samun damar zuwa gasar Kofin Duniya karon farko tun 1998, amma sai suka tashi 0-0. Kocin Curaçao, Dick Advocaat, wanda bai halarci wasan ba saboda dalilai na kashin kai, zai zama mafi tsufa da zai horas da ƙasa a gasar Kofin Duniya, mai shekaru 78 – zai karya tarihin Otto Rehhagel wanda ya jagoranci Girka yana da shekaru 71 a 2010. Curaçao, wacce take mil 37 daga gabar tekun Venezuela, ta zama ƙasa a cikin Masarautar Netherlands ne a 2010, bayan rushewar Netherlands Antilles. Shekaru goma da suka gabata suna matsayi na 150 a jerin ƙasashen FIFA. Yanzu suna matsayi na 82. Sabon tsarin Gasar Cin Kofin Duniya da za a yi a 2026, wanda zai ƙunshi ƙasashe 48 maimakon 32, tare da ƙasashen masu masaukin baki – Kanada, Mexico da Amurka – duk sun samu gurbi kai tsaye. Bayan Curaçao da za ta buga gasar kofin duniya a karon farko a tarihi cikinsu har da Cape Verde da Uzbekistan da kuma Jordan. Middlesbrough na daf da bai wa Kim Hellberg aikin kociyanta. Mai shekara 37, shi ne ke horar da Hammarby a ƙauyensu a Sweden, wanda ya kai ƙungiyar mataki na biyu a teburi a kaka biyun da ya ja ragama An tattauna da shi kan aikin kociyan a birnin Swansea a makon jiya, wanda ake sa ran zai maye gurbin Rob Edwards, wanda ya ajiye mukamin ya koma Wolverhampton mai buga Premier League. Hellberg, wanda ya taka leda a karamar gasar tamaula ta Sweden, yana da sauran kwantiragin kaka ɗaya. Ya fara aikin kociya a Kuddby IF, sai ya koma IF Sylvia daga nan ya shiga cikin masu horar da IFK Norrkoping a 2020. Ya fara nuna kansa a IFK Varnamo, inda ya taka rawar gani a kaka biyu da ta kai Hammarby ta ɗauke shi. Remo Stars ta yi nasarar cin Kano 1-0 a kwantan gasar Premier ta Najeriya da suka kara ranar Laraba. Mai masaukin bakin ta ci ƙwallon ta hannun Victor Mbaoma, saura minti 10 suje hutun rabin lokaci. Da wannan sakamakon Pillars wadda ake kira sai masu gida ta ci gaba da zama ta karshe a teburin babbar gasar tamaula ta Najeriya da maki shida. Bayan wasa 13 da fara kakar nan Pillars ta yi nasara biyu da canjaras uku aka doke ta karawa takwas. Pillars za ta karɓi bakuncin Ikorodu City a jihar Katsina a wasan mako na 14. Tawagar
Japan tana da damar lashe kofin duniya da za a yi a badi, in ji Keisuke Honda -
daya daga fitatcen tsohon dan kwallon kafar kasar – ya kara da
cewar za ta iya kai wa zagayen yan hudun karshe daga nan komai zai iya faruwa. Honda, mai shekara 39, wanda ya yi wa Japan wasa 90, ya
buga tamaula a kasashe biyar ciki har da Italiya a gasar Serie A tare da AC
Milan. A gasar kofin duniya da aka yi a Qatar a 2022, Japan ta
doke Sifaniya da Jamus a wasannin da ta kai zagayen yan 16. Tuni dai Japan ta samu tikitin buga gasar kofin duniya da
za a yi a badi a Amurka da Canada da kuma Mexico Kocin Ingila, Thomas Tuchel, ya ce zai tuntubi ‘yan wasan da aka daina gayyata tawagar a baya-bayan, domin ya taimaka musu su koma bayar da gudunmuwa kafin gasar Cin Kofin Duniya ta shekarar baɗi. Wasu ‘yan ƙwallon ciki har da Trent Alexander-Arnold na Real Madrid da Jack Grealish na Everton, an cire su daga jerin ‘yan wasan da suka buga neman gurbin shiga gasarkofin duniya a watan nan da ta doke Serbia da kuma Albania, yayin da ba a gayyaci Jude Bellingham ba a wasannin cikin watan Oktoba da ta yi nasara a kan Wales da kuma Latvia. Ingila za ta sake samun damar yin atisaye a cikin watan Maris, lokacin da za a yi wasannin cike gurbin shiga gasar kofin duniya. Daga nan ake sa ran kociyan ɗan kasar Jamus zai sanar da ƴan ƙwallon da za su wakilci Ingila a babbar gasar tamaula ta duniya da za a fara daga 11 ga watan Yuni zuwa 19 ga watan Yuli da tawaga 48 za ta ɓarje gumi a Amurka da Canada da kuma Mexico. Arsenal ta sanar cewa za ta kawo ƙarshen yarjejeniyar tallace-tallace da take yi wa Visit Rwanda a karshen kakar 2025/26, bayan shekara takwas da suka ƙulla ƙwantiragi. Tun farko sun cimma yarjejeniya a 2018, kuma rahotanni na cewa yarjejeniyar ta kai fiye da fam miliyan £10m ($13.3m) a kowacce shekara. Gunners za ta kawo karshen yarjejeniyar ce, sakamakon ƙaruwar tashin hankali a gabashin Jamhuriyar Dimokuraɗiyyar Kongo, wadda ke iyaka da Rwanda. Ko da yake an rattaba hannu kan yarjejeniyar zaman lafiya tsakanin mayaƙan M23 da Rwanda ke goyon baya da kuma gwamnatin Congo a farkon wannan makon. A watan Afrilu, Paris St-Germain ta tsawaita yarjejeniyar tallace-tallace da Visit Rwanda har zuwa karshen kakar 2028, yayin da Atletico Madrid ta rattaba hannu kan yarjejeniyar shekaru uku don sanya tambarin kamfanin a rigunan maza da na matan ƙungiyar a wannan kakar. Oleksandr Usyk ya mika kambunsa na WBO ajin babban nauyi, bayan da ya sanar da hukumar damben duniya cewa ba zai ci gaba da kare kambun ba da aka tsara zai fuskanci ɗan Britannia, Fabio Wardley. Hukumar ta ce ta samu “rubutacciyar wasika” daga tawagar ɗan wasan Ukraine, kuma ta tabbatar cewa mai shekara 38 ya “zaɓi mika kambun, maimakon dambatawa da ɗan Burntaniyar. Arsenal na jiran jin girman raunin da Gabriel ya ji lokacin da yake buga wa Brazil tamaula, wanda ake fargabar zai yi jinyar makonni da yawa. Mai tsaron bayan ya ji rauni ne a wasan sada zumunta da Brazil ta yi da Senegal a Emirates, wanda ake ta auna girman raunin da ya ji. Wata majiya na cewa mai shekara 27 zai yi jinyae mako huɗu, wasu kuma na cewa mai tsaron bayan zai kai watan Janairu kafin ya koma taka leda. Kenan ba zai buga wa Gunners wasan da za ta fuskanci Tottenham ba ranar Lahadi a gasar Premier League, kuma hakan koma baya ne ga ƙungiyar da Mikel Arteta ke jan ragama. Gabriel da William Saliba na taka rawar gani a tsare bayan Arsenal a kakar nan, inda ƙwallo biyar ne ya shiga ragarta a Premier League a kakar nan. Watakila Piero Hincapie ko kuma Cristhian Mosquera ya maye gurbin Gabriel. Arsenal, na fama da yan wasan da ke jinya da ya haɗa da ƙyaftin, Martin Odegaard da Noni Madueke da Gabriel Martinelli da Kai Havertz da kuma Viktor Gyokeres. Amurka za ta hanzarta bayar da bizar shiga ga baƙi ’yan ƙasashen waje masu tikitin shiga wasannin gasar cin kofin duniya da za a gudanar a shekara mai zuwa a birane 11 a Amurka, in ji Shugaba Donald Trump. Washington za ta kafa tsarin yin rajistar lokacin tattaunawar neman visa wanda zai bayar da mahimmaci ga masoya wasanni ’yan ƙasashen waje da za su halarci babbar gasar tamaula ta duniya. Za a fara gasar cin kofin duniya daga 11 ga watan Yuni zuwa 19 ga Yuli da za a yi a Mexico da Canada da kuma Amurka. Carlos Alcaraz ba zai buga Davis Cup ba, sakamakon raunin da ya ji ranar Lahadi a ATP Finals da Jannik Sinner ya doke shi ya lashe kofin a birnin Turin a Italiya. Hakan koma baya ne ga fatan tawagar Sifaniya na taka rawar gani a wasannin da za a buga a Bologna. Kenan Alcaraz mai shekara 22 ya kammala wasannin bana da lashe kofi takwas da ya haɗa da French Open da na US Open da hayewa matakin farko a gurbin masu buga tennis a duniya. Spaniya za ta buga Davis Cup zagayen kwata fainal da Czech Republic ranar Alhamis. Sai dai Alcaraz zai wakilci nahiyar Turai a Laver Cup da za su fuskanci tawagar Amurka da za a yi a Landan a baɗi. Gasar shigen irin Ryder Cup za a buga a O2 Arena daga 25 zuwa 27 ga watan Satumba. Hukumar Kwallon Kafa ta Duniya (FIFA) na shirin kaddamar da bincike na musamman kan yadda Hukumar Kwallon Kafa ta Malaysia (FAM) ke gudanar da harkokinta, bayan da ta dakatar da ‘yan wasa bakwai da aka ba su izinin zama ƴan ƙasa, saboda zargin amfani da takardun bogi. An dakatar da ‘yan wasan na tsawon wata 12 bayan FIFA ta gano cewa an yi amfani da takardun bogi domin ba su damar buga wasa neman shiga gasar Asian Cup tsakanin Malaysia da Vietnam. Dukkan ‘yan wasan bakwai sun buga wa Malaysia karawar da ta doke Vietnam 4-0 a zagaye na uku na neman cancantar shiga gasar Asian Cup ta 2027 da suka kara a cikin watan Yuni. Tsohon zakaran damben boksin ajin babban nauyi, Anthony
Joshua, zai fafata da fitatce a YouTube, Jake Paul ranar 19 ga watan Disamba a
birnin Miamin Amurka. Za kuma su dambata ne turmi takwas minti uku kowanne -
shi dai Joshua mai shekara 36 ya rike kambun boksin karo biyu na  WBO, WBA da kuma IBF. Barcelona za
ta koma fitaccen filinta na Nou Camp bayan fiye da shekaru biyu rabonta da shi,
wadda za ta kece raini da Athletic Club a gasar La Liga a ƙarshen mako. Za a sake bude Camp Nou bayan gyara gyaren da aka yi, amma zai dauki yan kallo sama da 45,000, a fafatawar da
Barcelona za ta karbi bakunci ranar Asabar. Wasan karshe da mai rike da La Ligan bara ta yi a filin
shi ne ranar 28 ga watan Mayun 2023 a karawa da Real Mallorca daga nan aka rufe
Camp Nou don yin kwaskwarima. An tsara filin zai ke karbar yan kallo 105,000 idan aka
kammala komai, hakan zai zama daya daga cikin filaye mafi girma a fadin
duniya - ranar 29 ga watan nan Barcelona za ta yi bikin cika shekara 125 da
kafuwa. Haka kuma kungiyar ta tuntubi Uefa, domin ta bata izinin
buga Champions League da Eintranch Frankfurt cikin watan Disamba a Camp Nou, bayan
da ta yi wasanni a Olympic Stadiya mai daukar yan kallo 55,000. Kociyan tawagar Ingila, Thomas Tuchel ya ce ya zama
wajibi Jude Bellingham yake amincewa da hukuncin da ya yanke. Dan kwallon Real Madrid ya nuna fushinsa lokacin da aka
sauya shi daf a tashi wasan neman shiga gasar cin kofin duniya da Ingila ta
je Albania ta yi nasarar cin 2-0 ranar Lahadi. Bellingham, wanda rabon da ya buga wa tawagar tamaula tun
cikin watan Yuni – an canja shi saura minti shida a tashi daga fafatawar da
Morgan Rogers - sai aka ga Bellingham ya murtuke, sannan yana daga hannu sama da
nunin bai so aka cire shi ba. Ƙungiyar ƙwallon kafa ta Barau ta yi sama zuwa
mataki na 16 a kan teburin gasar Premier ta Najeria, bayan da ta doke Enugu
Rangers 2-0 ranar Litinin a Sani Abacha Stadium da ke kofar mata a jihar Kano,
Nigeria. Kenan tana da maki 13 da kwantai ɗaya, bayan nasara
uku da canjaras huɗu da wasa biyar da aka doke ta. Ranar Lahadi Barau FC za ta ziyarci Remo Stars a wasan
mako na 14 a babbar gasar tamaula ta Najeriya. Bayan da ake buga wasannin kasa da kasa a neman shiga gasar cin kofin duniya, ana sa ran komawa karawar lik-lik a gasar kasashe, ciki har da na Turai a karshen makon nan. To sai dai kuma ana fargabar cewar ƴan wasa Arsenal da ya haɗa da Gabriel da Riccardo Calafiori da kuma Jurrien Timber sun ji rauni.. Ranar Lahadi Arsenal, wadda take kan teburin Premier League da tazarar maki huɗu za ta karɓi bakuncin abokiyar hamayyarta Tottenham a Emirates a gasar Premier League - daga nan kuma za ta fafata da Bayern Munich a Champions League ranar Laraba. Ɗan wasan Brazil, Gabriel da William Saliba suna taka rawar gani a tsare bayan Gunners a kakar nan, inda Arsenal ta yi wasa takwas a jere ba tare da ƙwallo ya shiga ragarta ba, wannan bajinta ce mai girma. Haka kuma ƙwallo biyar ne ya shiga ragar Arsenal daga karawa 11 da fara wasannin babbar gasar tamaula ta Ingila ta kakar nan. Ƙungiyar ƙwallon kafa ta Barau ta doke Enugu Rangers da cin 2-0 a wasan mako na 13 a gasar Premier ta Najeriya da suka kara ranar Litinin a filin wasa na Sani Abach da ke kofar mata a Kano, Najeriya. Barau FC ta fara cin ƙwallo ta hannun Mohammed Umar daga baya Kemin Joseph ya kara na biyu. Da wannan sakamakon Barau FC ta yi sama zuwa mataki na 16 a kan teburin babbar gasar tamaula ta Najeriya da maki 13 da kwantai ɗaya, bayan nasara uku da canjaras huɗu da wasa biyar da aka doke ta. Ranar Lahadi Barau FC za ta ziyarci Remo Stars a wasan mako na 14 a Premier League. Tsohon ɗan wasan Chelsea, Oscar, ya bar asibiti ranar Lahadi bayan kwana biyar yana jinya, sakamakon matsalolin zuciya, in ji ƙungiyarsa Sao Paulo. An ce ɗan ƙwallon mai shekaru 34 ya gamu da matsalar bugun zuciya a lokacin gwaje-gwajen tunkarar kakar baɗi, kuma jami’an kungiyar tare da likitocin Asibitin Einstein Hospital Israelita suka kula da shi. Oscar ya lashe gasar Premier League biyu tare da Chelsea, sannan ya ɗauki Chinese Super League uku tare da Shanghai Port. Ya koma Sao Paulo a watan Disambar bara, inda ya rattaba hannu kan kwangilar shekaru uku tare da kulob ɗin da ya fara buga wasa tun yana yaro.

Kocin Curaçao, Dick Advocaat, wanda bai halarci wasan ba saboda dalilai na kashin kai, zai zama mafi tsufa da zai horas da ƙasa a gasar Kofin Duniya, mai shekaru 78 – zai karya tarihin Otto Rehhagel wanda ya jagoranci Girka yana da shekaru 71 a 2010. Curaçao, wacce take mil 37 daga gabar tekun Venezuela, ta zama ƙasa a cikin Masarautar Netherlands ne a 2010, bayan rushewar Netherlands Antilles. Shekaru goma da suka gabata suna matsayi na 150 a jerin ƙasashen FIFA. Yanzu suna matsayi na 82. Sabon tsarin Gasar Cin Kofin Duniya da za a yi a 2026, wanda zai ƙunshi ƙasashe 48 maimakon 32, tare da ƙasashen masu masaukin baki – Kanada, Mexico da Amurka – duk sun samu gurbi kai tsaye. Bayan Curaçao da za ta buga gasar kofin duniya a karon farko a tarihi cikinsu har da Cape Verde da Uzbekistan da kuma Jordan. Middlesbrough na daf da bai wa Kim Hellberg aikin kociyanta. Mai shekara 37, shi ne ke horar da Hammarby a ƙauyensu a Sweden, wanda ya kai ƙungiyar mataki na biyu a teburi a kaka biyun da ya ja ragama An tattauna da shi kan aikin kociyan a birnin Swansea a makon jiya, wanda ake sa ran zai maye gurbin Rob Edwards, wanda ya ajiye mukamin ya koma Wolverhampton mai buga Premier League. Hellberg, wanda ya taka leda a karamar gasar tamaula ta Sweden, yana da sauran kwantiragin kaka ɗaya. Ya fara aikin kociya a Kuddby IF, sai ya koma IF Sylvia daga nan ya shiga cikin masu horar da IFK Norrkoping a 2020. Ya fara nuna kansa a IFK Varnamo, inda ya taka rawar gani a kaka biyu da ta kai Hammarby ta ɗauke shi. Remo Stars ta yi nasarar cin Kano 1-0 a kwantan gasar Premier ta Najeriya da suka kara ranar Laraba. Mai masaukin bakin ta ci ƙwallon ta hannun Victor Mbaoma, saura minti 10 suje hutun rabin lokaci. Da wannan sakamakon Pillars wadda ake kira sai masu gida ta ci gaba da zama ta karshe a teburin babbar gasar tamaula ta Najeriya da maki shida. Bayan wasa 13 da fara kakar nan Pillars ta yi nasara biyu da canjaras uku aka doke ta karawa takwas. Pillars za ta karɓi bakuncin Ikorodu City a jihar Katsina a wasan mako na 14. Tawagar
Japan tana da damar lashe kofin duniya da za a yi a badi, in ji Keisuke Honda -
daya daga fitatcen tsohon dan kwallon kafar kasar – ya kara da
cewar za ta iya kai wa zagayen yan hudun karshe daga nan komai zai iya faruwa. Honda, mai shekara 39, wanda ya yi wa Japan wasa 90, ya
buga tamaula a kasashe biyar ciki har da Italiya a gasar Serie A tare da AC
Milan. A gasar kofin duniya da aka yi a Qatar a 2022, Japan ta
doke Sifaniya da Jamus a wasannin da ta kai zagayen yan 16. Tuni dai Japan ta samu tikitin buga gasar kofin duniya da
za a yi a badi a Amurka da Canada da kuma Mexico Kocin Ingila, Thomas Tuchel, ya ce zai tuntubi ‘yan wasan da aka daina gayyata tawagar a baya-bayan, domin ya taimaka musu su koma bayar da gudunmuwa kafin gasar Cin Kofin Duniya ta shekarar baɗi. Wasu ‘yan ƙwallon ciki har da Trent Alexander-Arnold na Real Madrid da Jack Grealish na Everton, an cire su daga jerin ‘yan wasan da suka buga neman gurbin shiga gasarkofin duniya a watan nan da ta doke Serbia da kuma Albania, yayin da ba a gayyaci Jude Bellingham ba a wasannin cikin watan Oktoba da ta yi nasara a kan Wales da kuma Latvia. Ingila za ta sake samun damar yin atisaye a cikin watan Maris, lokacin da za a yi wasannin cike gurbin shiga gasar kofin duniya. Daga nan ake sa ran kociyan ɗan kasar Jamus zai sanar da ƴan ƙwallon da za su wakilci Ingila a babbar gasar tamaula ta duniya da za a fara daga 11 ga watan Yuni zuwa 19 ga watan Yuli da tawaga 48 za ta ɓarje gumi a Amurka da Canada da kuma Mexico. Arsenal ta sanar cewa za ta kawo ƙarshen yarjejeniyar tallace-tallace da take yi wa Visit Rwanda a karshen kakar 2025/26, bayan shekara takwas da suka ƙulla ƙwantiragi. Tun farko sun cimma yarjejeniya a 2018, kuma rahotanni na cewa yarjejeniyar ta kai fiye da fam miliyan £10m ($13.3m) a kowacce shekara. Gunners za ta kawo karshen yarjejeniyar ce, sakamakon ƙaruwar tashin hankali a gabashin Jamhuriyar Dimokuraɗiyyar Kongo, wadda ke iyaka da Rwanda. Ko da yake an rattaba hannu kan yarjejeniyar zaman lafiya tsakanin mayaƙan M23 da Rwanda ke goyon baya da kuma gwamnatin Congo a farkon wannan makon. A watan Afrilu, Paris St-Germain ta tsawaita yarjejeniyar tallace-tallace da Visit Rwanda har zuwa karshen kakar 2028, yayin da Atletico Madrid ta rattaba hannu kan yarjejeniyar shekaru uku don sanya tambarin kamfanin a rigunan maza da na matan ƙungiyar a wannan kakar. Oleksandr Usyk ya mika kambunsa na WBO ajin babban nauyi, bayan da ya sanar da hukumar damben duniya cewa ba zai ci gaba da kare kambun ba da aka tsara zai fuskanci ɗan Britannia, Fabio Wardley. Hukumar ta ce ta samu “rubutacciyar wasika” daga tawagar ɗan wasan Ukraine, kuma ta tabbatar cewa mai shekara 38 ya “zaɓi mika kambun, maimakon dambatawa da ɗan Burntaniyar. Arsenal na jiran jin girman raunin da Gabriel ya ji lokacin da yake buga wa Brazil tamaula, wanda ake fargabar zai yi jinyar makonni da yawa. Mai tsaron bayan ya ji rauni ne a wasan sada zumunta da Brazil ta yi da Senegal a Emirates, wanda ake ta auna girman raunin da ya ji. Wata majiya na cewa mai shekara 27 zai yi jinyae mako huɗu, wasu kuma na cewa mai tsaron bayan zai kai watan Janairu kafin ya koma taka leda. Kenan ba zai buga wa Gunners wasan da za ta fuskanci Tottenham ba ranar Lahadi a gasar Premier League, kuma hakan koma baya ne ga ƙungiyar da Mikel Arteta ke jan ragama. Gabriel da William Saliba na taka rawar gani a tsare bayan Arsenal a kakar nan, inda ƙwallo biyar ne ya shiga ragarta a Premier League a kakar nan. Watakila Piero Hincapie ko kuma Cristhian Mosquera ya maye gurbin Gabriel. Arsenal, na fama da yan wasan da ke jinya da ya haɗa da ƙyaftin, Martin Odegaard da Noni Madueke da Gabriel Martinelli da Kai Havertz da kuma Viktor Gyokeres. Amurka za ta hanzarta bayar da bizar shiga ga baƙi ’yan ƙasashen waje masu tikitin shiga wasannin gasar cin kofin duniya da za a gudanar a shekara mai zuwa a birane 11 a Amurka, in ji Shugaba Donald Trump. Washington za ta kafa tsarin yin rajistar lokacin tattaunawar neman visa wanda zai bayar da mahimmaci ga masoya wasanni ’yan ƙasashen waje da za su halarci babbar gasar tamaula ta duniya. Za a fara gasar cin kofin duniya daga 11 ga watan Yuni zuwa 19 ga Yuli da za a yi a Mexico da Canada da kuma Amurka. Carlos Alcaraz ba zai buga Davis Cup ba, sakamakon raunin da ya ji ranar Lahadi a ATP Finals da Jannik Sinner ya doke shi ya lashe kofin a birnin Turin a Italiya. Hakan koma baya ne ga fatan tawagar Sifaniya na taka rawar gani a wasannin da za a buga a Bologna. Kenan Alcaraz mai shekara 22 ya kammala wasannin bana da lashe kofi takwas da ya haɗa da French Open da na US Open da hayewa matakin farko a gurbin masu buga tennis a duniya. Spaniya za ta buga Davis Cup zagayen kwata fainal da Czech Republic ranar Alhamis. Sai dai Alcaraz zai wakilci nahiyar Turai a Laver Cup da za su fuskanci tawagar Amurka da za a yi a Landan a baɗi. Gasar shigen irin Ryder Cup za a buga a O2 Arena daga 25 zuwa 27 ga watan Satumba. Hukumar Kwallon Kafa ta Duniya (FIFA) na shirin kaddamar da bincike na musamman kan yadda Hukumar Kwallon Kafa ta Malaysia (FAM) ke gudanar da harkokinta, bayan da ta dakatar da ‘yan wasa bakwai da aka ba su izinin zama ƴan ƙasa, saboda zargin amfani da takardun bogi. An dakatar da ‘yan wasan na tsawon wata 12 bayan FIFA ta gano cewa an yi amfani da takardun bogi domin ba su damar buga wasa neman shiga gasar Asian Cup tsakanin Malaysia da Vietnam. Dukkan ‘yan wasan bakwai sun buga wa Malaysia karawar da ta doke Vietnam 4-0 a zagaye na uku na neman cancantar shiga gasar Asian Cup ta 2027 da suka kara a cikin watan Yuni. Tsohon zakaran damben boksin ajin babban nauyi, Anthony
Joshua, zai fafata da fitatce a YouTube, Jake Paul ranar 19 ga watan Disamba a
birnin Miamin Amurka. Za kuma su dambata ne turmi takwas minti uku kowanne -
shi dai Joshua mai shekara 36 ya rike kambun boksin karo biyu na  WBO, WBA da kuma IBF. Barcelona za
ta koma fitaccen filinta na Nou Camp bayan fiye da shekaru biyu rabonta da shi,
wadda za ta kece raini da Athletic Club a gasar La Liga a ƙarshen mako. Za a sake bude Camp Nou bayan gyara gyaren da aka yi, amma zai dauki yan kallo sama da 45,000, a fafatawar da
Barcelona za ta karbi bakunci ranar Asabar. Wasan karshe da mai rike da La Ligan bara ta yi a filin
shi ne ranar 28 ga watan Mayun 2023 a karawa da Real Mallorca daga nan aka rufe
Camp Nou don yin kwaskwarima. An tsara filin zai ke karbar yan kallo 105,000 idan aka
kammala komai, hakan zai zama daya daga cikin filaye mafi girma a fadin
duniya - ranar 29 ga watan nan Barcelona za ta yi bikin cika shekara 125 da
kafuwa. Haka kuma kungiyar ta tuntubi Uefa, domin ta bata izinin
buga Champions League da Eintranch Frankfurt cikin watan Disamba a Camp Nou, bayan
da ta yi wasanni a Olympic Stadiya mai daukar yan kallo 55,000. Kociyan tawagar Ingila, Thomas Tuchel ya ce ya zama
wajibi Jude Bellingham yake amincewa da hukuncin da ya yanke. Dan kwallon Real Madrid ya nuna fushinsa lokacin da aka
sauya shi daf a tashi wasan neman shiga gasar cin kofin duniya da Ingila ta
je Albania ta yi nasarar cin 2-0 ranar Lahadi. Bellingham, wanda rabon da ya buga wa tawagar tamaula tun
cikin watan Yuni – an canja shi saura minti shida a tashi daga fafatawar da
Morgan Rogers - sai aka ga Bellingham ya murtuke, sannan yana daga hannu sama da
nunin bai so aka cire shi ba. Ƙungiyar ƙwallon kafa ta Barau ta yi sama zuwa
mataki na 16 a kan teburin gasar Premier ta Najeria, bayan da ta doke Enugu
Rangers 2-0 ranar Litinin a Sani Abacha Stadium da ke kofar mata a jihar Kano,
Nigeria. Kenan tana da maki 13 da kwantai ɗaya, bayan nasara
uku da canjaras huɗu da wasa biyar da aka doke ta. Ranar Lahadi Barau FC za ta ziyarci Remo Stars a wasan
mako na 14 a babbar gasar tamaula ta Najeriya. Bayan da ake buga wasannin kasa da kasa a neman shiga gasar cin kofin duniya, ana sa ran komawa karawar lik-lik a gasar kasashe, ciki har da na Turai a karshen makon nan. To sai dai kuma ana fargabar cewar ƴan wasa Arsenal da ya haɗa da Gabriel da Riccardo Calafiori da kuma Jurrien Timber sun ji rauni.. Ranar Lahadi Arsenal, wadda take kan teburin Premier League da tazarar maki huɗu za ta karɓi bakuncin abokiyar hamayyarta Tottenham a Emirates a gasar Premier League - daga nan kuma za ta fafata da Bayern Munich a Champions League ranar Laraba. Ɗan wasan Brazil, Gabriel da William Saliba suna taka rawar gani a tsare bayan Gunners a kakar nan, inda Arsenal ta yi wasa takwas a jere ba tare da ƙwallo ya shiga ragarta ba, wannan bajinta ce mai girma. Haka kuma ƙwallo biyar ne ya shiga ragar Arsenal daga karawa 11 da fara wasannin babbar gasar tamaula ta Ingila ta kakar nan. Ƙungiyar ƙwallon kafa ta Barau ta doke Enugu Rangers da cin 2-0 a wasan mako na 13 a gasar Premier ta Najeriya da suka kara ranar Litinin a filin wasa na Sani Abach da ke kofar mata a Kano, Najeriya. Barau FC ta fara cin ƙwallo ta hannun Mohammed Umar daga baya Kemin Joseph ya kara na biyu. Da wannan sakamakon Barau FC ta yi sama zuwa mataki na 16 a kan teburin babbar gasar tamaula ta Najeriya da maki 13 da kwantai ɗaya, bayan nasara uku da canjaras huɗu da wasa biyar da aka doke ta. Ranar Lahadi Barau FC za ta ziyarci Remo Stars a wasan mako na 14 a Premier League. Tsohon ɗan wasan Chelsea, Oscar, ya bar asibiti ranar Lahadi bayan kwana biyar yana jinya, sakamakon matsalolin zuciya, in ji ƙungiyarsa Sao Paulo. An ce ɗan ƙwallon mai shekaru 34 ya gamu da matsalar bugun zuciya a lokacin gwaje-gwajen tunkarar kakar baɗi, kuma jami’an kungiyar tare da likitocin Asibitin Einstein Hospital Israelita suka kula da shi. Oscar ya lashe gasar Premier League biyu tare da Chelsea, sannan ya ɗauki Chinese Super League uku tare da Shanghai Port. Ya koma Sao Paulo a watan Disambar bara, inda ya rattaba hannu kan kwangilar shekaru uku tare da kulob ɗin da ya fara buga wasa tun yana yaro.
